channel.title: Xerascape, Simply Amazing [LOADS OF CONTENT] ClanChat [508]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2yl21wg.png[/img]
[COLOR="#008080"][B]Hey everyone,[/B][/COLOR]
After a few months working on my server i'm releasing it now. It has alot of content. It has a little "anti-leech" but it is very easy to solve:) Enjoy!
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/28t9y0w.png[/img]Download link Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/414j4j2ulamurjf/Xerascape_Client_by_AFG-.rar]Xerascape Client by AFG-.rar[/url] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/l3QjY.gif[/img]Download link Server: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/h6bdk2g49g49tga/Xerascape_Server_by_AFG.rar]Xerascape Server by AFG.rar[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2h3zjae.png[/img]Download link Cache: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/zbmzset0w7cqdm6/XerascapeCache_by_AFG-.rar]XerascapeCache by AFG-.rar[/url] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/1498569.png[/img]Forums: [url=http://xerascape.createaforum.com/index.php]Xerascape Forums - Index[/url]
[COLOR="#008080"]F[B]eatures[/B]:[/COLOR]
[ul][*]Perfect switching [*]Working Duel arena/Pest control/Fight pits/Barrows [*]Jad [*]508 maps [*]Rewritten Slayer [*] Almost perfect working Clanchat with Saving! [*]Stable, can hold 300+ players [*]Al working 317 skills [*]Very good economy [*]Fixed all PI glitches & dupes [*]Working clanchat inlcuding saving! [*]Near perfect region music [*]100% curses [*]New 660+ items [*] KBD/Copr.Beast/Tormented Demons/ Godwars [*] npc/pvp clipping [*] Donator/Veteran/Info ranks working[/ul]
[B]Double EXP-weekends[/B]
[COLOR="#008080"][B]Pictures:[/B][/COLOR]
Login screen: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/71p8ip.png[/img]
Loading screen: [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/nd4sw0.png[/img]
Ancient/Lunar/Normal magic working 100% [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/33os5ra.png[/img]
Lumbridge: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2n5e3d.jpg[/img]
Duel arena working also 100%. [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/22kj7l.png[/img]
Home of Xerascape [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1zg5dj.png[/img]
Prayer and attacking working: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/nz14w.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/30atdlc.png[/img]
Working 667+ items! [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2z6b5o5.png[/img]
Thieving and getting XP works perfect: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/d4jm.png[/img]
Torva and the Abyssal Vine whip [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/jv6dz5.png[/img]
Duel arena: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/9aadqa.png[/img]
Region music unlocked. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/5f0lk2.png[/img]
Agility works 100% [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/21e1303.jpg[/img]
We have also corpeal beast working perfectly. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/30wtssn.png[/img]
Hope you liked it, if so please use the [COLOR="#008080"][B]Thanks[/B][/COLOR] button :hurr:

[COLOR="#008080"]Hey everyone,[/COLOR]

After a few months working on my server i’m releasing it now. It has alot of content.
It has a little “anti-leech” but it is very easy to solve:) Enjoy!

[]Jad
